dialogue: Yes! Trust me, you won't regret it!
Just as Spirit was about to comment,
she heard a gunshot and felt a sharp pain in her leg.
She began falling and saw Shoju get hit
While it's a shame that you didn't join us,
it would be remiss of me to let you
just go ahead and ally with an Army soldier.
The one who fired the gun walked up to Spirit.
So, I'm afraid this is goodbye~
The last thing Spirit saw was the gun pointed
at her face, before Taquil pulled the trigger.
